data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 3, Rubin Kazan's Oliver Abildgaard gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 5, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Rubin Kazan's Hwang In-beom misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 11, Filip Uremovic of Rubin Kazan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
Important block from the Volgograd defence as Oleg Shatov fires in a strike for Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 11, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Volgograd will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan push forward at Zenit Stadium and Djordje Despotovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Volgograd defence.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan are whistled for offside.
Rubin Kazan's Hwang In-beom breaks free at Zenit Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 17, Volgograd have a goal kick.
In Volgograd, Oleg Aleynik of Volgograd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Free kick Volgograd.
In the minute 20, Carl Starfelt (Rubin Kazan) has received a yellow card from Vladislav Bezborodov.
Volgograd are pushing forward but Oleg Aleynik's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Zenit Stadium.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 23, Armen Manucharyan is booked for the home team.
Rubin Kazan are coming forward and Hwang In-beom gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 24, Vladislav Bezborodov awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 27, Volgograd drive upfield and Evgeniy Pesegov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In the minute 28, Volgograd's Cedric Gogoua gets in a shot on goal at Zenit Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 30, Silvije Begic (Rubin Kazan) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Saba Kverkvelia for Volgograd has been booked by Vladislav Bezborodov and receives a first yellow card.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 31, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Rubin Kazan close to the penalty box.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Oleg Nikolaev.
In the minute 40, Volgograd's Oleg Nikolaev has been booked in Volgograd.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Volgogradâ€™s Oleg Nikolaev is on his feet again at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 42, Volgograd needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Rubin Kazan take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Djordje Despotovic.
Throw-in for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Zenit Stadium.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 45, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Volgograd.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 48, Armen Manucharyan (Volgograd) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Volgograd.
Throw-in high up the field for Rubin Kazan in Volgograd.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Aleksandr Zuev (Rubin Kazan) gets a yellow card.
Aleksandr Khatskevich is making the team's first substitution at Zenit Stadium with Beka Mikeltadze replacing Kirill Kolesnichenko.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 56, Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Djordje Despotovic (Rubin Kazan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 57, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rubin Kazan drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Volgograd.
Great finish from Khvicha Kvaratskhelia to give Rubin Kazan a 0-2 lead.
Flamarion puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 1-2.
In the minute 61, Great play from Oleg Nikolaev to set up the goal.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Volgograd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rubin Kazan's half?
Rubin Kazan drives forward and Denis Makarov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Hwang In-beom gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
The away team replace Denis Makarov with Soltmurad Bakaev.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 73, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan just outside Volgograd's area.
Oliver Abildgaard for Rubin Kazan drives towards goal at Zenit Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 74, Rubin Kazan have been awarded a penalty...
Oleg Shatov gives Rubin Kazan a 1-3 lead from the penalty spot.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Rubin Kazan make their second substitution with Ilya Samoshnikov replacing Aleksandr Zuev.
Igor Konovalov is on a sub for Oleg Shatov for Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 82, Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
In the minute 83, Ivan Ignatyev is replacing Djordje Despotovic for the away team.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 85, The home team replace Patricio Matricardi with Oleg Kozhemyakin.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 88, Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Oliver Abildgaard (Rubin Kazan) has received a first yellow card.
Rubin Kazan's Oliver Abildgaard misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a throw-in for Rubin Kazan, close to Volgograd's area.
Rubin Kazan are coming forward and Ivan Ignatyev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (Rubin Kazan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Volgograd to check on Oleg Nikolaev, who is grimacing with pain.
Aleksandr Khatskevich (Volgograd) has taken off Oleg Nikolaev who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Kirill Dontsov is the replacement.
